name: BeStitched!
description:
Liberate your stashed yarn, embroidery floss and fabric from the gloomy depths of their cupboard and help them achieve their destiny as beautiful crafted items!

Made in a couple of days flat for the Rainbow Jam 2021, this is my attempt at learning how to put together a match three game with a twist.

All you need is one button and the patience to unravel the mess you left in the yarn drawer.

Known issues:

  • Crafting detection is a bit wonky
  • Sound effects are annoying
  • Overlap issues with crafted items
  • Streak score modifier needs work
  • More variety needed in crafted items
  • Latest build somehow skips the start menu but I'm too tired to put it back right now
  • Probably a ton more stuff

Background music (but not the annoying sound effects!) by the ever-talented Tdous.

* please note, not in ANY way better than Bejeweled
